home.title: Just Say!
home.subtitle: So that you can speak foreign languages ​​without fear. Say it until you get it!

language.title: Let’s go on a trip now! Please select a language to communicate in.

city.city_subtitle: The accent of the city you choose will be reflected in the vocal room you will be speaking to.

situation.situation_title: In what situation would you like to have a conversation?
situation.situation_subtitle: The situation you choose will be reflected in the person you are talking to.

preparation.preparation_subtitle: Shall I look at the menu and order what I want to eat?

conversation.conversation_title: Look at the menu and order what you want to eat at the cafe.

result.fail: Oh, shall I say that again?
